H1.text: star cast of ab tumhare hawale watan sathiyon. Akshay Kumar

H2.text: star cast of ab tumhare hawale watan sathiyon. Bobby Deol

H3.text: star cast of ab tumhare hawale watan sathiyon. Nagma

A4.text: the latter was an ensemble film starring Amitabh Bachchan, Akshay Kumar and Deol (in a double role)

A5.text: The ensemble comedy Housefull 4 (2019) co-starring Akshay Kumar and Riteish Deshmukh, was Deol's subsequent film.
